executable.title: Tractography ROI Seeding
executable.description: Seed tractography from a Diffusion Tensor Image (DTI) within a region defined by a label map.
executable.license: 3D Slicer Contribution and Software License Agreement
executable.contributor: Raul San Jose, Demian Wassermann, Lauren O'Donnell (SPL, LMI, BWH, SlicerDMRI)
executable.acknowledgements: The SlicerDMRI developers gratefully acknowledge funding for this project provided by NIH NCI ITCR U01CA199459 (Open Source Diffusion MRI Technology For Brain Cancer Research), NIH P41EB015898 (National Center for Image-Guided Therapy) and NIH P41EB015902 (Neuroimaging Analysis Center), as well as the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NA-MIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

image.name: InputVolume
image.label: Input DTI Volume
image.description: DTI volume in which to seed (generate) tractography.

image.name: InputROI
image.label: Input Label Map
image.description: Label map defining region for seeding tractography.

double.name: ClTh
double.label: Start Threshold
double.description: Minimum Linear Measure for the seeding to start.

double.name: MinimumLength
double.label: Minimum Length
double.description: Minimum length of the fibers (in mm)

string-enumeration.name: ThresholdMode
string-enumeration.label: Stopping Criteria
string-enumeration.description: Tensor measurement used to start and stop the tractography

double.name: StoppingValue
double.label: Stopping Value
double.description: Tractography will stop when the stopping measurement drops below this value

double.name: StoppingCurvature
double.label: Stopping Track Curvature
double.description: Tractography will stop if radius of curvature becomes smaller than this number units are degrees per mm

double.name: IntegrationStepLength
double.label: Integration Step Length(mm)
double.description: Distance between points on the same fiber in mm

parameters.label: Label definition
parameters.description: Selection of label(labels) for ROI definition

integer.name: ROIlabel
integer.label: Seeding label
integer.description: Label value that defines seeding region.

double.name: SeedSpacing
double.label: Seed Spacing
double.description: Spacing (in mm) between seed points, only matters if use Use Index Space is off
